text: Director, I'm running a bit late.

…Even though it's just assisting with a 5-minute program,
do we really need a meeting?

It's necessary.
That's why we have a meeting.
Wow, mixing orange juice with iced coffee…

Oh… haha, like a middle schooler, huh?
Playing around at the drink bar.
It's really not my thing; I can't handle that.

But depending on the combination,
it might taste good, right?
If it tastes good, well, I guess it's fine…
But really, that kind of thing is just not for me.
